text: Zhen zhu zhi yi ge ren de nengli er jiayi zecheng. Ge ren yao xiangshou ziji suo xingshan gong de jiangshang, yao zaoyu ziji suozuo zui'e de chengfa.“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao chengfa women, ruguo women yiwang huo cuowu. Qiu ni buyao shi women he fu zhongdan, youru ni shi guren he fu ta yiyang. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao shi women danfu women suo buneng sheng ren de. Qiu ni shu rao women, qiu ni she you women, qiu ni lianmin women. Ni shi women de baoyou zhe, qiu ni yuanzhu women, yi duikang bu xindao de minzhong.” (A li yi mu lan)
